com.guardtime.ksi

Interface KSI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Extender, PublicationsHandler, Reader, Signer, Verifier

    public interface KSI
extends Signer, Extender, Reader, Verifier, PublicationsHandler, Closeable
    Composite interface for signing, extending, verifying, and publications handling. An instance of this class can be obtained using KSIBuilder class.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • verify

        VerificationResult verify(VerificationContext context,
                          Policy policy)
                   throws KSIException
        Verifies the KSI signature.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of VerificationContext to be used to validate the KSI signature.
        policy - policy to be used to verify the KSI signature.
        Returns:
        The verification result (VerificationResult).
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g. when communication with KSI service fails).

      • verify

        VerificationResult verify(KSISignature signature,
                          Policy policy)
                   throws KSIException
        Verifies the KSI signature. Uses the KSIExtenderClient defined by KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolExtenderClient(KSIExtenderClient) method. The publications file is downloaded using the client specified by method KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolPublicationsFileClient(KSIPublicationsFileClient).
        Parameters:
        signature - KSI signature to verify.
        policy - policy to be used to verify the signature.
        Throws:
        KSIException
        See Also:
        verify(KSISignature, Policy, DataHash, PublicationData)

      • verify

        VerificationResult verify(KSISignature signature,
                          Policy policy,
                          PublicationData publicationData)
                   throws KSIException
        Verifies the KSI signature. Uses the KSIExtenderClient defined by KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolExtenderClient(KSIExtenderClient) method. The publications file is downloaded using the client specified by method KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolPublicationsFileClient(KSIPublicationsFileClient).
        Parameters:
        signature - KSI signature to verify.
        policy - policy to be used to verify the signature.
        publicationData - publication data to be used to verify the signature, may be null.
        Throws:
        KSIException
        See Also:
        verify(KSISignature, Policy, DataHash, PublicationData)

      • verify

        VerificationResult verify(KSISignature signature,
                          Policy policy,
                          DataHash documentHash)
                   throws KSIException
        Verifies the KSI signature. Uses the KSIExtenderClient defined by KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolExtenderClient(KSIExtenderClient) method. The publications file is downloaded using the client specified by method KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolPublicationsFileClient(KSIPublicationsFileClient).
        Parameters:
        signature - KSI signature to verify.
        policy - policy to be used to verify the signature.
        documentHash - the original document hash, may be null.
        Throws:
        KSIException
        See Also:
        verify(KSISignature, Policy, DataHash, PublicationData)

      • verify

        VerificationResult verify(KSISignature signature,
                          Policy policy,
                          DataHash documentHash,
                          PublicationData publicationData)
                   throws KSIException
        Verifies the KSI signature. Uses the KSIExtenderClient defined by KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolExtenderClient(KSIExtenderClient) method. The publications file is downloaded using the client specified by method KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolPublicationsFileClient(KSIPublicationsFileClient).
        Parameters:
        signature - KSI signature to verify.
        policy - policy to be used to verify the signature.
        documentHash - the original document hash, may be null.
        publicationData - publication data to be used to verify the signature, may be null.
        Throws:
        KSIException
        See Also:
        verify(VerificationContext, Policy)
